 select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT('LINESTRING(
 1539590.35547 5187274.2628,
 1539599.07729 5187270.4252,
 1539593.49533 5187258.12744,
 1539585.03517 5187262.48835,
  1539590.35547 5187274.2628
)')), 4326)

1539575.70282 5187270.25077,
 1539586.25622 5187265.6282,
 1539590.18104 5187273.65227,
 1539579.71486 5187279.32146,
 1539575.70282 5187270.25077
)')), 4326)

 create table datos as
  select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT('LINESTRING(
1539500.94241 5187103.84331,
 1539506.34993 5187118.14708,
 1539533.73643 5187107.85534,
 1539528.15447 5187093.55156,
 1539500.94241 5187103.84331
)')), 4326) as geom

union
 select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT('LINESTRING(
 1539480.53336 5187097.04029,
 1539494.83714 5187092.15607,
 1539485.59201 5187068.2583,
 1539471.46267 5187074.538,
 1539480.53336 5187097.04029
)')), 4326)

 1539523.27026 5187124.77566,
 1539529.89884 5187145.70802,
 1539537.92291 5187149.54562,
 1539542.45825 5187160.53511,
 1539560.42519 5187153.20878,
 1539548.04021 5187117.2749,

--- dos ultimas ---------

 select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT('LINESTRING(
13.8292110341 42.1741202952,
 13.8293155098 42.1740795674,
 13.8292535327 42.1739361346,
 13.8291632231 42.1739609254,
 13.8292110341 42.1741202952
)')), 4326)




union
 select ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePolygon( ST_GeomFromEWKT('LINESTRING(
13.8288958361 42.1738387419,
 13.8289896872 42.1737873894,
 13.8289241685 42.1736740598,
 13.8288285466 42.1737254123,
 13.8288958361 42.1738387419
)')), 4326)



select ST_Transform(geom, 4326) from datos
